content: at the end of each even row as a ssk with the garter ridge being the second stitch slipped but if k2tog is easier for you in this section it still makes a nice edge steam or wet block before stuffing and final seaming as needed stuff your brick with stuffing for a squishier brick foam for a stiffer brick or some combination of the two for a goldilocks-ier brick and seam your bobble edge to your co edge weave in ends and test your brick by throwing it a picture of your least favorite tech oligarch please send me photos or videos of your bricks in action @hannah_ermi_roderick on instagram and i hope this pattern helps bring you some comfort and catharsis in these trying times if you notice any errors in this pattern or if you d like to make a crochet version of the pattern which would be super cool but i don t know how to crochet pls help please reach out to me on ravelry maroonjumper or instagram if you d like to sell physical knitted non- cooperation bricks please credit me as the creator thank you © hannah roderick 2025 non-cooperation brick knitting pattern pa ge | 4
